title: World Generator Wiki Files List Incomplete

content.raw:
There are some missing erb files in the list on the World Generator page. Page also should mention that the *erb files need to be deleted otherwise the wget appends a .<number> to the download. Maybe wget has a overwrite option?

Here's a download script to get them all:



```
#!script

#!/bin/bash

rm *.erb

wget #!/osrf/srcsim/raw/default/worlds/air_leak_detector.erb
wget #!/osrf/srcsim/raw/default/worlds/cable.erb
wget #!/osrf/srcsim/raw/default/worlds/habitat.erb
wget #!/osrf/srcsim/raw/default/worlds/leak.erb
wget #!/osrf/srcsim/raw/default/worlds/satellite.erb
wget #!/osrf/srcsim/raw/default/worlds/solar_panel.erb
wget #!/osrf/srcsim/raw/default/worlds/unique.world.erb

```

